element.name: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: Contains the Path of the Giant Barbarian subclass content.

element.name: Path of the Giant
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: Barbarians who follow the Path of the Giant draw strength from the primordial forces of the giants, channeling their might and stature in battle.

element.name: Giant's Havoc
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: While raging, you gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Elemental Cleaver: Weapon attacks deal +1d6 elemental damage (force, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder) and gain the thrown property. Thrown weapons return to your hand immediately.

element.name: Elemental Cleaver
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: At 6th level, you can infuse one weapon with elemental power. Choose one element: fire, cold, acid, lightning, or thunder. Your weapon deals an extra 1d6 damage of the chosen type while raging.

element.name: Mighty Impel
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: At 10th level, you gain the ability to hurl creatures. As a bonus action, you can throw a creature within 30 feet, dealing 1d6 damage of your elemental type and knocking it prone.

element.name: Demiurgic Colossus
element.source: Bigby Presents: Glory of the Giants

description.p: At 14th level, your transformation while raging grows further. You can become Huge if you were Large or smaller, and your elemental damage increases to 2d6.
